APIs.name: Get Project Modules
APIs.description: Gets all modules of the project.

APIs.name: List Directory Contents
APIs.description: Gets the content of a directory. By default it returns the content of the current directory.

optional_parameters.name: dirName
optional_parameters.description: Address of a directory to list

APIs.name: Change Directory
APIs.description: Changes the current working directory to a new one.

optional_parameters.name: targetDirName
optional_parameters.description: The address of the directory that will become the working directory. Path should be relative to the current working directory or be the full path.

APIs.name: Get Kt File Kt Methods
APIs.description: Gets a list of Kotlin named functionsâ€™ names of the file with the .kt extension.

required_parameters.name: fileName
required_parameters.description: The name of the file with the .kt extension.
